item.title: ‘Walter Boys’ Star Noah LaLonde on Cole’s Growth in Season 2, His Self-Sabotage Moment and “Frustrating” Relationship With Jackie
item.description: “He’s trying to show up for people better. He doesn’t always succeed, but he’s trying,” the actor tells THR of his character’s new chapter this season.
